Get Response:
01 C0 00 00 47

Status:
80 F2 01 01 12
80 F2 00 0C 00

80 F2 00 01 12

Pins:
00 2C 00 01 00

00 20 00 01 00

00 D6 88 00 01

Manage Channel:
00 70 00 00 01
00 70 80 01 00

Read Record:
00 B2 01 E4 03
00 B2 11 BC 6E
00 B2 0F D4 08

00 DC 01 C4

00 88 00 81 22
01 88 00 81 22

Search Record:

FCP response:
For MF: 	62 2F 82 02 78 21 83 02 3F 00 A5 09 80 01 71 83 04 00 01 CE 6F 8A 01 05 8B 03 2F 06 02 C6 0C 90 01 60 83 01 01 83 01 81 83 01 0A 81 04 00 02 DC A1
For ADF: 	62 45 82 02 78 21 84 10 A0 00 00 00 87 10 02 FF FF F0 01 89 00 00 01 FF A5 11 80 01 71 81 03 01 0A 32 82 01 0A 83 04 00 01 CE 6F 8A 01 05 8B 03 2F 06 08 C6 0C 90 01 60 83 01 01 83 01 81 83 01 0A 81 04 00 00 26 80
For TF: 	62 19 82 02 41 21 83 02 2F E2 A5 03 80 01 71 8A 01 05 8B 03 2F 06 06 80 02 00 0A
For LF: 	62 1F 82 05 42 21 00 35 03 83 02 2F 00 A5 03 80 01 71 8A 01 05 8B 03 2F 06 04 80 02 00 9F 88 01 F0
